item.description:
Please post your suggestions regarding the time and place of the next meet up to the message board or email me.

I get notified each time the message board gets a new message. If you would like to post events, email me. I will make you assistant organizer and then you can access the calendar.

We need a regular meeting place, it could be a coffeeshop or something like that.

The organizer of this group (me!) lives in Florida and we need a local leader to set up meet ups.

Thanks!
Mia

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: Boston 9/11 Truth November Meetup
